summary.span: 提供用于保存 XPS 文档内容的 。

span.span: Provides a that holds the content of an XPS document.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 包含一个 ，它包含一个或多个 元素。An contains a that comprises one or more elements. 向构造函数传递一个对的引用， 用于写入、存储和读取文档的内容元素。The constructor is passed a reference to a for writing, storing, and reading the content elements of the document. [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)] 使用构造函数创建新的空 。A new empty [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)] is created by using the constructor. [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)] 使用方法打开现有的 。An existing [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)] is opened by using the method. [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)] 通过调用方法将根添加到空 。A root is added to an empty [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)] by calling the method. 包含打印机信息和控件的元素还可以与 或 存储在中的单个和 元素相关联 。 elements with printer information and control can also be associated with the , or on individual and elements that are stored in the . 有关详细信息， [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)] 请参阅 XML 纸张规格 (XPS) 可供下载 [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65761](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65761) 。For more information about [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)] see the XML Paper Specification (XPS) available for download at [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65761](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65761).

summary.span: 关闭 XPS 文档 。

span.span: Closes the XPS document .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果 已打开以进行写访问，则会将数据缓冲区写入存储区，并关闭物理文档 。If the was opened for write access, data buffers are written to the store and the physical document is closed. 调用后，不能通过此实例访问文档的任何部分 。After has been called, no parts of the document can be accessed with this instance. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何打开、插入内容并关闭 。The following example shows how to open, insert content, and close an . [!code-cpp[XpsCreate#XpsCreatePackageOpen](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/XpsCreate/CPP/XpsCreate.cpp#xpscreatepackageopen)] [!code-csharp[XpsCreate#XpsCreatePackageOpen](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/XpsCreate/CSharp/XpsCreate.cs#xpscreatepackageopen)] [!code-vb[XpsCreate#XpsCreatePackageOpen](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/XpsCreate/visualbasic/xpscreate.vb#xpscreatepackageopen)] 下面的示例还演示了如何打开、写入和关闭 。The following example also shows how to open, write to, and close an . MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void Dispose(bool disposing) cil managed
Protected Overridable Sub Dispose (disposing As Boolean)
abstract member Dispose : bool -> unit override this.Dispose : bool -> unit

param.name: disposing
param.span: 若要释放托管资源和非托管资源，则为 ；若仅释放非托管资源，则为 。

span.span: to release both managed and unmanaged resources; to release only unmanaged resources.

summary.span: 释放由 占用的非托管资源，还可以选择释放托管资源。

span.span: Releases the unmanaged resources that are used by the and optionally, releases the managed resources.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法由公共 `Dispose()` 方法和 方法调用。This method is called by the public `Dispose()` method and the method. `Dispose()` 调用受保护的 `Dispose(Boolean)` 方法，并将 `disposing` 参数设置为 `true` 。`Dispose()` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`. `Dispose`在设置为的情况调用 `disposing` `false` 。 invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`. 当 `disposing` 参数为 true 时，此方法释放该引用的任何托管对象所持有的所有资源 。When the `disposing` parameter is true, this method releases all resources that are held by any managed objects that this references. 此方法将调用每个被引用对象的 `Dispose()` 方法。This method invokes the `Dispose()` method of each referenced object.

para.span: 其他对象可以调用多次 。

span.span: Other objects can call multiple times.

para.span: 重写时 ，请注意不要引用先前在调用时已释放的对象 。

span.span: When you override , be careful not to reference objects that were previously disposed of in an earlier call to .

para.span: 有关如何实现的详细信息 ，请参阅 [实现 Dispose 方法](/dotnet/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose)。

span.span: For more information about how to implement , see [Implementing a Dispose Method](/dotnet/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose).

para.span: 有关和的详细 信息 ，请参阅 [清理非托管资源](/dotnet/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged) 和 [重写 Finalize 方法](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/ddae83kx(v=vs.100))。

span.span: For more information about and , see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](/dotnet/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged) and [Overriding the Finalize Method](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/ddae83kx(v=vs.100)).

param.name: certificate
param.span: 用于对每个部件进行签名的 X.509 证书；或为 以提示用户选择已安装的证书。

span.span: The X.509 certificate to use in signing each part; or to prompt the user to select an installed certificate.

param.name: embedCertificate
param.span: 若要在包中存储证书，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: to store the certificate in the package; otherwise, .

param.span: 指示必须从签名中排除的依赖部件的标志。

span.span: Flags that indicate what dependent parts must be excluded from the signing.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果 `certificate` 为 `null` ，则会出现一个对话框，用户可以使用该对话框选择已安装的 x.509 证书，如从智能卡读卡器。If `certificate` is `null`, a dialog box appears that enables the user to select an installed X.509 certificate, such as from a smart card reader. ## Examples 下面的示例显示如何使用 方法。The following example shows how to use the method.
